channel.title: Need yell help! -Coloring yell and adding crowns-!
channel.description:
Well, I'm using a pure deltascape source, the one delta released, just with no anti-leech.
And I'm wondering how i can add colored yell with admin crowns and mod crowns?
Like, it'll say [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2hpopwy.gif[/img]Thomas: Hey people or [IMG]http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa42/xarlock1/ModCrown.gif[/img]Thomas: Hey people
I wanna know how to do that ^^
I've asked on different sites, but all the scripts have had 100 errors. and I've tried fixing them, but only got down to 55 errors.
I would appreciate if someone would give me this script with no errors. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2009, 08:18:03 pm[/size][hr]Help.. please!!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 07:13:39 am[/size][hr]NO ONE!? PLZ!

item.title: Need yell help! -Coloring yell and adding crowns-!

Well, I’m using a pure deltascape source, the one delta released, just with no anti-leech.

And I’m wondering how i can add colored yell with admin crowns and mod crowns?
